thread.title: Dundee Corporation to Host Conference Call for First Quarter 2018 Results

author: cnbc.com
title: Dundee Corporation to Host Conference Call for First Quarter 2018 Results
text:
TORONTO, May 08, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Dundee Corporation (TSX:DC.A) (“Dundee” or the “Company”) senior management will host a conference call on Monday May 14, 2018 at 10 a.m. ET to discuss the Company’s first quarter 2018 results.
FIRST QUARTER 2018 RESULTS CONFERENCE CALL AND WEBCAST
Date: Monday, May 14, 2018 Time: 10 a.m. ET Webcast: www.dundeecorp.com Live Call: 1.888.231.8191 or 1.647.427.7450 Replay: 1.855.859.2056 or 1.416.849.0833 Replay Passcode: 8778163
Dundee plans to issue a news release containing the first quarter 2018 results before market open on Monday, May 14, 2018 and will also post it to the Company’s web site. The conference call will be archived for replay until Monday, May 21, 2018 at midnight. An archive of the audio webcast will also be available at Dundee’s website.
ABOUT DUNDEE CORPORATION
Dundee Corporation is a public Canadian independent holding company, listed on the Toronto Stock Exchange under the symbol “DC.A”. Through its operating subsidiaries, Dundee Corporation is engaged in diverse business activities in the areas of investment advisory, corporate finance, energy, resources, agriculture, real estate and infrastructure. Dundee Corporation also holds, directly and indirectly, a portfolio of investments mostly in these key areas, as well as other select investments in both publicly listed and private enterprises.
FOR FURTHER INFORMATION PLEASE CONTACT:
John Vincic
Investor and Media Relations
Dundee Corporation
(647) 402-6375
Source:Dundee Corporation
